DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the presence of proteins in solid tumors which may lead to an immune response
DOC.brief_title: Proteomic Analysis of HLA Complex in Solid Cancers: Breast, Ovary, Colon, Rectum, Stomach, and Pancreas
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective of the study is to evaluate which proteins are presented by the HLA complex of solid tumors. Secondary objectives include to evaluate whether an immune response specific to these proteins has actually been provoked and whether there is a similar immune response following recurrence. Real specimens will be evaluated using PCR and mass spectrometry.
DOC.criteria: Patients with adenocarcinoma of breast, colon, rectum, ovary , stomach, pancreas Withdrawal of consent Small specimen which does not allow to retrieve tissue without interfering with pathologic evaluation
